LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_EnableExtraGeysers: Enable additional steam geysers generating in certain ashland biomes.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_EnableFetcherflyHives: Enable fetcherfly hives generating in certain ashland biomes.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_EnableCavePlants: Enable custom cave plants for ashland biomes.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_EnableColumnarBasalt: Enable columnar basalt around the exterior of natural basalt walls.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_EnableColumnarBasalt_Too: Enabling this will cause columnar basalt to generate around natural basalt walls.
